relation: This command was integrated into Cisco IOS Release 12.2(18)S.
This command was integrated into Cisco IOS Release 12.2(28)SB.
This command was integrated into Cisco IOS Release 12.2(33)SRA.
This command was integrated into Cisco IOS Release 12.2(33)SXH.
This command was introduced on Cisco ASR 1000 Series Routers.
This command was modified. The link-local keyword was changed to linkscope.
This command was modified. New counters were added to the output to show (*,G/m) and the total number of unique groups in the database.
This command was modified. New counters were added to the output to show (*,G/m) and the total number of unique groups in the database.
The vrf vrf-name keyword and argument were added.

textBeforeTable: Syntax Description [cache] ] [ poolname pool local ipv6 show To display information about any defined IPv6 address pools, use the show ipv6 local pool command in privileged EXEC mode. show ipv6 local pool show ipv6 mtu show ipv6 mroute active show ipv6 mroute show ipv6 mrib route show ipv6 mrib client show ipv6 mobile tunnels show ipv6 mobile traffic show ipv6 mobile router show ipv6 mobile host groups show ipv6 mobile home-agents show ipv6 mobile globals show ipv6 mobile binding show ipv6 mld traffic show ipv6 mld ssm-map show ipv6 mld snooping show ipv6 mld interface show ipv6 mld host-proxy show ipv6 mld groups summary show ipv6 mld groups show ipv6 mfib summary show ipv6 mfib status show ipv6 mfib route show ipv6 mfib interface show ipv6 mfib instance show ipv6 mfib global show ipv6 mfib count show ipv6
